title: STAT+: Alabama hospital system would gain monopoly with proposed $450 million deal
description: A $450 million deal would leave Huntsville, Ala., with a single hospital system, unless regulators step in.
content: A $450 million deal would leave Huntsville, Ala., with a single hospital system, unless regulators step in.
